pages.title: Cryst. Redstone Block
pages.text: $(crystalised_redstone_block) are introduced by $(sorcerycraft) and are used in the conception of a $(ritual_circle). $(br2)A block of $(crystalised_redstone_block) can be crafted with $(bold)8x Redstone Dusts$() and $(bold)1x$() $(crystals). $(br)See the recipe on the opposite page.
